entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 4:00 AM ADT Sunday 2 April 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 120 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 7:17 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:17 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:17 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
